info.name: Dark Skin for Slack
info.description:
Makes Slack darker, because the original white theme isn't great for the eyes.
Can't provide any screenshots due to a current problem with my PC that makes all saved pictures appear darker than they actually are.
info.additionalInfo:
Made by editing and merging code from:
Black Slack
https://userstyles.org/styles/101501/black-slack

SBlack 0.1
https://userstyles.org/styles/100139/sblack-v0-1

Slack Dark Theme
https://userstyles.org/styles/101311/slack-dark-theme

Thanks to the creators of these themes for simplifying the process of making it look better by not making me have to write out all the code myself.

The code might not be the cleanest, and might have some duplicate lines, but I can't be bothered to fix it because it ain't broke.
